title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Errol Spence:  "Stuff Happens for a reason"
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Errol Spence:  "Stuff Happens for a reason"
description:
Chris is back with an all-new podcast as he sits down with Keith Idec and Errol Spence. Chris and Keith talk about the return of Ryan Garcia and how he was a little rusty, and they break down Errol Spence Spence's upcoming fight against Ugas. Last, Errol himself stops by the show to talk about his return after injury and what we can expect from him this weekend. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
